channel.title: Xteleall issue
channel.description: It's not really an issue with me adding or removing codes, but when I use ::xteleall that I added, and there's about 100 online everyone DC's.

item.title: Xteleall issue
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

if(command.startsWith("xteleall") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dell")) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client) p; // specific player's client castOn.toX = absX; // replaced with your tele X coord castOn.toY = absY; // replaced with your tele Y coord } } }

replace your command with that : ]
test it out and tell me how it works .
ive specified what each line does so you could understand it better, so if you dont like mine you can just edit your own .

Read full topic

item.title: Xteleall issue
item.dc:creator: @epicmike epicmike
item.description:
@epicmike wrote:

it gets laggy when 100 people all try to tele to the same place. Simply your computer cant handle it so i suggest not using it just as Pvp-Evolution said.
